channel.title: Leadership on Celeste Basken
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Celeste Basken

item.title: Sunrise Movement
item.description: I’ve been involved with the youth-led Sunrise Movement for two years. Recently, the team that I led within my local hub of the movement convinced our County Council and County Executive to endorse the Federal Green New Deal and call on the Biden Administration and Congress to take a strong stance on climate.

item.title: Model United Nations
item.description: I love Model United Nations because it combines public policy and public speaking, which are both things I enjoy. In Model United Nations, I research my given country and their history, politics, economy, environment, and anything else relevant to the topic at hand.
